They've finally added dual wielding :D

item.title: Dual Wielding, Graphics and Shields - BTS #6
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Acorn_, post:63, topic:446374”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=549237.msg4028450#msg4028450 date=1340533040]

[quote author=LilXCj link=topic=549237.msg4027580#msg4027580 date=1340473829]

Looks good.

Been in WoW
Been in LoL
Been in Everquest
…Oh wait, they’re all MMORPG’s.
[/quote]Except LoL isn’t an MMORPG, gtfo.

It’s an RPG, it’s multiplayer, it’s online, it’s probably not massive though.

Is your definition of an MMO a login-based character setting? I’d like to know. That’s what I’m assuming since things like StarCraft and WarCraft have been MMORPGs for a while (although, technically a different genre, I think RTS or something like that)
[/quote]An MMO involves having a persistant world, not lobby-based gameplay.

Wouldn’t that just be any massive online multiplayer game regardless if it’s a persistent world or not?[/quote]He meant RPG, not MMO.

Read full topic
item.source: Dual Wielding, Graphics and Shields - BTS #6

Is your definition of an MMO a login-based character setting? I’d like to know. That’s what I’m assuming since things like StarCraft and WarCraft have been MMORPGs for a while (although, technically a different genre, I think RTS or something like that)
[/quote]An MMO involves having a persistant world, not lobby-based gameplay.[/quote]
Wouldn’t that just be any massive online multiplayer game regardless if it’s a persistent world or not?

item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

Davidi2:

They added the SOF because they needed the money and were basically forced to find a way to make more money by the company owners.

The investors don’t own all the company, the game makers must have at least some say and also they created SOF.

Anyway, all i’m saying is that there trying to make the game better but the few things they have added doesn’t.

Read full topic

item.title: Dual Wielding, Graphics and Shields - BTS #6
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:58, topic:446374”][quote author=xxlukexx link=topic=549237.msg4027813#msg4027813 date=1340490344]

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=549237.msg4027808#msg4027808 date=1340489806]

it’s clear jagex want to make runescape better again after ruining it so much.

Not really… Not after another SOF stunt of adding 200M to the wheel.
[/quote]Yea find me a video or anything of anyone winning that prize. Sure, they are trying to get people to buy spins because they are losing money, but I honestly believe they made it rare enough that it wont change the game at all.

It won’t change the game much but enough people are stupid enough to buy even MORE spins to get it. Neither is this “making Runescape better”
[/quote]Nor did they intend for it to change the game, so it doesn’t even count as a real ‘update’…? They are clearly trying to make the game better with their updates.[/quote]

I know they probably didn’t intent for it to change the game but it ain’t exactly making Runescape better after them ruining it already. Who said anything about updates? There clearly trying to make it better with the updates but SOF just ruins the actual game and kinda hints they don’t really care. To me, its 50/50.

Read full topic
item.source: Dual Wielding, Graphics and Shields - BTS #6

It won’t change the game much but enough people are stupid enough to buy even MORE spins to get it. Neither is this “making Runescape better”[/quote]Nor did they intend for it to change the game, so it doesn’t even count as a real ‘update’…? They are clearly trying to make the game better with their updates.
